original: Blomgren, Sven Åke, lektor, Vänersborg, f. 14/7/08 i Kalmar av lektorn, fil. dr Åke B. o. Lydia Wikström. G. 33 m. Rut Helander. Barn: Gunnar f. 36, Karin 40, Ingeborg 45. — Studiex. i Kalmar 26, fil. mag. i Upps. 29, fil. lic. 31, fil. dr 34, provår 40-41. Res. t. Ital. 34, Danm. o. Tyskl. 35. Docent i lat. språket o. litt. v. Upps. univ. 33-43, docistip. 34-40, up-peh. på förordn. den m. prof. i lat. spr. o. litt. fören. und ivisn :skyldigh. samt del av ex iskyldigh. vt. 37, tre fjärdedel, av und :visn :skyldigh. vt. 40, ex:’skyldigh. ’ helt eiller delv. fil. ggr und. åren 38, 39, 40 o. 42, lär._ v. Sigtuna human, lär o v. 41-42, e. adj. v. Vänersborgs h. a. 1. ht 42, lektor i latin o. grek. där ised. 43. Kalmar nat. i Upps. f|örste kurator 32-33. Sikr.: fyra fackveit :skapl. avh. i Upps. univ :<s’ års->skr., upps. i Eranos o. a.
translated: Blomgren, Sven Åke, lecturer, Vänersborg, born on July 14, 1908 in Kalmar, son of lecturer, PhD Åke B. and Lydia Wikström. Married in 1933 to Rut Helander. Children: Gunnar born in 1936, Karin in 1940, and Ingeborg in 1945. He passed his high school exams in Kalmar in 1926, received his Bachelor's degree from Uppsala University in 1929, his Master's degree in Philosophy in 1931, his Ph.D. in Philosophy in 1934 and served his probationary year from 1940-1941. He traveled to Italy in 1934, Denmark and Germany in 1935. He was an associate professor of Latin language and literature at Uppsala University from 1933-1943, and a teacher at Sigtuna Humaniora School in 1937, 1938, 1939, 1940 and 1942. He completed his habilitation for the position of professorship in Latin language and literature in 1934-1940 and spent some time as a replacement professor. He was elected as the first curator of Kalmar nation in Uppsala from 1932-1933. He has published four academic papers in the University of Uppsala's annual writings, as well as in Eranos and others.

hasOccupation.name: Associate Professor of Latin Language and Literature

memberOf.name: Association of Latin Language and Literature Professors
